title: Animal Fairy Tales
description: Second edition. Published by International Wizard of Oz Club. A new, reset and corrected edition of nine stories by Baum originally published in the Delineator magazine in 1905. Includes The Story of Jaglon, The Stuffed Alligator, The Discontented Gopher, The Forest Oracle, The Enchanted Buffalo, The Pea-Green Poodle, The Jolly Giraffe of Jomb, The Troubles of Pop Wombat, and The Transformation of Bayal the Porcupine. Illustrated with black and white drawings by Dick Martin and with an introductioon by MacFall. One of only 1000 hardcover copies. Colorful dust jacket art also by Martin. 158 pp plus colophon.
author: L. Frank Baum
